attributes.action: Implement ratified UNCRC, ratify Protocol 12 ECHR, & amend HR Act '98 to include Article 13 ECHR
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned :
1. Call for implementation of ratified UNCRC.
2. Refer to UNCRC Article 43 Committee that in its 8th session in 1995, in "Concluding Observations of the Committee on the Rights of the Child Concerning UK", found that Britain was in violation of the Treaty. "In this the Committee observes in particular that the principal for the best interest of the child appears not to be in legislation in such areas as health, education, social security, which have a bearing on the rights of the child." 
3. Refer to the "disappointment" of England Children's Commissioner and to UNICEF reported 2007 that the UK “is failing its children” and “bottom of a league table for child well-being across 21 industrialised countries”.
4. Call on government to amend the HR  Act 98 to include Protocol 12 (the Parliamentary Human Rights Committee have called for this) and Article 13 of ECHR.
5. Call for a substantial proportion of legal aid to be hypothecated for use by disabled/disadvantaged children.
